email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Atlanta
email_response.body:
Hi there!

I'm very interested in this satellite upgrade project in Atlanta!

I wanted to confirm that I have all the equipment you're looking for:
- Bucket truck (2022 Altec AT40G)
- Spectrum analyzer (Anritsu MS2720T)
- Extension ladder (32ft Werner)

I'm definitely willing to travel within the region as needed. I've been doing this type of work for over 8 years now with excellent references.

I've attached my current insurance certificate for your review. It's a $2.5M general liability policy through State Farm, valid through December 2027.

Please let me know what the next steps are!

Best regards,
John Smith
Tech Services LLC
(404) 555-0127
